channel.description: Recent content on Dan's Blog Site

item.title: Terraform vs ARM Templates
item.description: Terraform vs ARM Templates Terraform ARM Templates HCL (2.0 in >v0.12) JSON Variables Parameters Local values Variables Resources Resources Functions Functions Modules Nested / Linked Templates Automatic depencies (via graph) Explicit dependencies Reference by resource name (or data source) Refer by reference or resourceId

item.title: Error: "features": required field is not set
item.description: Terraform - “Error: “features”: required field is not set” Issue: Something I came across time and time again when working through the MS Learn Course Automate your deployments with Azure DevOps was the following error in my Azure DevOps build pipelines: "Error: "features": required field is not set" ## Steps to reproduce: Create a basic terraform configuration using terraform 0.12 or later and AzureRM provider version 2.0 or later. E.g:

item.title: about
item.description: This is a personal blog about cloud engineering and automation (mostly Azure related) maintained by me, Dan Tracey. I’m a senior platform engineer with over 15 years’ experience in public and private cloud and software-defined datacenter consultancy on Windows, Linux and VMware infrastructure, including automation, orchestration, design, implementation, migration and support. Experience of working in both the private and public sector within Managed Services, Retail, Defence, Home Affairs, Space, Local Government and the NHS.
